description: Curfews and closures are tightened in Hungary and Portugal, in Europe's second wave.
title: Coronavirus: Hungary and Portugal in partial lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Hungary and Portugal in partial lockdown - BBC News
maintext: Its state of emergency has started and is set to last at least two weeks. The curfew covers 70% of the population, including Lisbon and Porto. On weekdays it runs from 23:00 to 05:00 local time, but at weekends it will run from 13:00 to 05:00.
